about_the_game:
A click-through visual novel about a lesbian couple who goes to a secret BDSM club. They must be prepared for whatever the dominatrix tells them to do.

Visual Novel Description

Mindy and Shay, a cute lesbian couple, are going through a difficult time, arguing almost every other day.
Not even their sex life is the same as in the beginning, each of them wanting different things.
After a series of discussions and compromises, they decide to try something completely new, to spice things up.
Leaving jealousy aside, they go to a secret BDSM club for the first time.
Once they arrive there, the dominatrix warns them that they will be filmed and that there are a series of rules to be followed.
Will the girls be intrigued or intimidated by what they will be told to do?
Will their relationship recover once they experience the most twisted sexual fantasies?
Let’s find out together.

name: Sex Adventures - Futanari BDSM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
